lyrics:
Lag ja gale 


 Hmm hmm


 Haseen raat Hmm


Lag ja gale ke phir yeh Haseen raat ho na ho..


 Shayad phir iss janam mein Mulaqaat ho na ho


 Lag ja gale ke phir yeh

 Haseen raat ho na ho..


 Shayad phir iss janam mein


 Mulaqaat ho na ho


 Lag ja gale.. ae.. ae..


 Humko mili hain aaj yeh


 Ghadiyaan naseeb se


 Jee bhar ke dekh leejiye


 Humko qareeb se


 Phir aap ke naseeb mein


 Yeh baat ho na ho..


 Shayad phir is janam mein


 Mulaqaat ho na ho


 Lag ja gale.. ae.. ae..Paas aaiye ke hum nahin


 Aayenge baar baar


 Paas aaiye ke hum nahin


 Aayenge baar baar


 Baahein gale mein daal ke


 Hum ro lein zaar zaar


 Aankhon se phir yeh pyaar ki


 Barsaat ho na ho 


Shaayad phir is janam mein


 Mulaqaat ho na ho


 Lag jaa gale ke phir yeh


Haseen raat ho na ho


 Shaayad phir iss janam mein


 Mulaqaat ho na ho


 
Lag ja gale.. ae.. ae..

Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye


 Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye


 Door rahati hai too, mere paas aati nahi


 hoothon pe tere, kabhi pyaas aati nahi


 aisa lage jaise ke tu, has ke zahar koi piye jaaye


 Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye


 Baat jab main karu, mujhe rok deti hain kyon


 teri meethi nazar, mujhe tok deti hain kyon


 teri hayaa, teri sharam teri kasam mere hoth siye jaaye


 Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye


 Ek ruthhi hui, taqadeer jaise koi


 khaamosh aese hai tu, tasaweer jaise koi


 teri nazar, ban ke zubaan lekin tere paigaam diye jaaye


 Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye


 Ye shaam mastaani, madahosh kiye jaaye


 muje door koi khinche, teri aur liye jaaye
